name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Light Crew Socks - Unisex
description: These performance socks have compression bands at the ankle, arch and instep to help hold the sock in place during activity.Made of wool, nylon, elastane.Indestructawool reinforces and strengthens high-impact areas to add durability and long-term cushioning.Mesh zones provide ventilation for moisture and temperature control.Flat knit durable toe seam for high burst strength.Light cushion for varied trail terrain.
